welcome_message_body: Welcome to Calgary, where the majestic Rocky Mountains meet urban charm! Known for its famous Stampede, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cafe Koi
restaurants.description: Cafe Koi is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Calgary.
restaurants.address: 1011 1 St. Southwest (11th Ave.), Calgary AB T2R 0T8

restaurants.name: Vintage Chophouse and Tavern
restaurants.description: Vintage Chophouse and Tavern is a steakhouse located in Calgary.

restaurants.name: Native Tongues
restaurants.description: Native Tongues is a mexican restaurant located in Calgary.

restaurants.name: Grumans Catering and Delicatessen
restaurants.description: Grumans Catering and Delicatessen is a deli located in Calgary.
restaurants.address: 230 11 Ave SE (Macleod Trail SE), Calgary AB T2G 0X8

restaurants.name: Korean Village Restaurant
restaurants.description: Korean Village Restaurant is a korean restaurant located in Calgary.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Calgary International Airport houses domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a domestic terminal at Calgary International Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is an international terminal at Calgary International Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
